Others: West Indies have set South Africa 136 to win at North Sound in their Super Eight match of the T20 World Cup.
Kyle Mayers hit 35 off 34 balls on a tricky pitch in Antigua.
Roston Chase hit 52 for the West Indies.
Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 for 27 while Keshav Maharaj had 1 for 24 in their four overs for the Proteas.
